name: Tidy Teddy, Messy Teddy
description:
The game's central theme is cleanliness where Teddy can switch between being messy and tidy.

Controls

Controller

  • Move - left stick
  • Look around - right stick
  • Jump - A
  • Use - X

Keyboard 

  • Move - WASD
  • Look around - Mouse
  • Jump - SPACE
  • Use - E

For the best experience use of a controller is recommended :)

Source code: https://github.com/Gamedera/that-one-room
